file_content.text: My client is still... indisposed, but rest assured, he's very grateful.
Your client is safe now. I think I've flushed all of the assassins.
So I hear. My client and the local moisture farmers really owe you a big debt.
That's for all your trouble--much obliged. I hope we get a chance to work together again sometime.
Take care out there.
I'll stay and keep the client covered. You deal with the hit men.
What's with the weapons? Expecting an attack?
My client is in a situation. Hired guns, looking to put him out of business the old fashioned way.
Losing my client would destroy this community. I've stepped up to keep that from happening--think you could do the same?
Count me in.
Why can't your client tell me about this?
Does your client speak?
My client... isn't in the proper state to address this matter. A stressful situation for everyone. I'm handling his affairs for the time being.
That isn't my problem.
I can keep the client covered, but I can't go out and deal with the problem. You could.
My client represents the charitable arm of a corporation producing water vaporators. All local vaporators were provided at a steep discount by my client.
But the crime lords who used to control the vaporator supply don't like competition. So they've hired a pro to take out my client.
The pro sends teams of killers anytime my client uses a holoterminal. If you use a few holoterminals with his ident card, you could ambush the teams and track down their boss.
Sounds like a plan.
Glad to have you on board.
Is this paid work?
My client has funds for a reward. That's no concern.
Here's the ident card. I'll hold things down here--good luck.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Then do me a favor and move along.
That's close enough.
